Name: intel-gpu-telegraf
Overview: Docker container running telegraf and polling Intel GPU stats.

@attributes.Name: telegraf_hostname
@attributes.Description: Container Variable: This will set the hostname variable in telegraf.conf

@attributes.Name: influx_url
@attributes.Description: Container Variable: This will set the outputs.influxdb URL variable in telegraf.conf

@attributes.Name: influx_db
@attributes.Description: Container Variable: This will set the database variable in telegraf.conf

@attributes.Name: influx_password
@attributes.Description: Container Variable: This will set the database password variable in telegraf.conf

@attributes.Name: influx_skip_db_creation
@attributes.Description: Container Variable: This will set the skip_database_creation variable in telegraf.conf

CAComment: This template is set up to use a custom network. You may have to adjust the network or IP address etc to match your system
